title: relationship--incoporatedlocref
description: Relationship that indicates the location that the organization is incorporated at.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `relationship`.

source_ref.description: The ID of the source (from) object.

target_ref.description: The ID of the target (to) object.

relationship_type.title: relationship_type
relationship_type.description: The name used to identify the type of relationship.
